Class PresetVertex

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public final class PresetVertex
extends Object
implements Vertex
    Read-only, struct-like Vertex implementation.

      • position

        public Vector2 position()
        Description copied from interface: Vertex
        Returns the position of this vertex in a 2-dimensional space.

        Implementations should return a copy of the position vector to ensure immutability of this object - Vector2.cpy().

        Specified by:
        position in interface Vertex
        Returns:
        a copy of this vertex position vector

      • vector2HashCode

        public static int vector2HashCode(Vector2 v)
        Hashes v without integer overflow and returns result modulo Integer.MAX_VALUE.

        The default Vector2.hashCode() method overflows and can return the same hash for different vectors. This method tries to alleviate that.

        Parameters:
        v - a Vector2 object to hash
        Returns:
        the hash code of v
